B

Brutus - Class in <Unnamed>
A command line tool to brute force a rotational cipher text, by using the chi-squared law and letter frequencies for English.
Brutus() - Constructor for class Brutus
 

C

Caesar - Class in <Unnamed>
A command line tool to apply a shift cipher to an input string, given any shift integer.
Caesar() - Constructor for class Caesar
 
chiSquared(double[], double[]) - Static method in class Brutus
Returns the chi-squared score for two arrays; representing the frequencies of each letter in the alphabet.
count(String) - Static method in class Brutus
Returns an array with 26 elements, counting the number of occurrences of each letter in a given input string.

E

english - Static variable in class Brutus
A set array of the frequencies of each letter in English language.

F

frequency(String) - Static method in class Brutus
Returns an array with 26 elements; counting the frequency of each letter in a given input string.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Brutus
Takes a single string argument and attempts to brute force this cipher-text as English.
main(String[]) - Static method in class Caesar
Applies a shift cipher to the cipher text given a shift integer n.

R

rotate(int, char) - Static method in class Caesar
Rotates a single char by the given shift value.
rotate(int, String) - Static method in class Caesar
Rotates a string into cipher text by the given shift value.
